SA11n1132:5: tanna śrāvakasādhāraṇena śuddhimātreṇa sattvānāṃ janyata ityarthaḥ |
SA11n1132:7: tatra āryaratnameghe balamuktam- na sa sattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yo bodhisattvasya balena balaṃ mardayet | ityādi ||
SA11n1132:9: yaduktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre āryavajrapāṇerbaladarśanavismitājātaśatrupṛṣṭena bhagavatā- daśabhirmahārāja dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattva evaṃrūpāṃ balavattāṃ pratilabhate |
SA11n1132:11: iha mahārāja bodhisattvaḥ kāyaṃ jīvitaṃ ca parityajati,
SA11n1132:19: glānānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ bhūtacikitsāyai utsuko bhavati |
SA11n1132:28: yathoktaṃ sāgaramatisūtre- ārabdhavīryeṇa sāgaramate bodhisattvena bhavitavyaṃ sadā dṛḍhaparākrameṇa |
SA11n1132:30: ārabdhavīryāṇāṃ hi sāgaramate bodhisattvānāṃ na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ |
SA11n1132:37: utpalaṃ vārimadhye vā so'nupūrveṇa vardhate | ityādi |
SA11n1132:40: yathoktaṃ vajracchedikāyām- yo bodhisattvo'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti,
SA11n1132:42: mahatyāmapi prajñāpāramitāyāmuktam- punaraparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena alpamapi dānaṃ dadatā sarvasattveṣu sarvākārajñatāyāmupāyakauśalyapariṇāmaganatāyāmaprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ kartukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam |
SA11n1132:43: tathā sarvasattvānāṃ manorathān paripūrayitukāmena yāvajjātarūparajataudyānarājyādibhirupakaraṇaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyamiti ||
SA11n1132:44: vinā ca karuṇayā na bodhisattvānāṃ kiṃcicceṣṭitamiti vakṣyāmaḥ |
SA11n1132:46: puṇyavṛddhiḥ sarvavṛddhīnāṃ mūlamiti tadartha parikarabandha ucyate-
SA11n1132:49: cittaśuddhikālabhāvitānāṃ vyavasāyādīnāṃ prayogārambhe punarāmukhīkaraṇena dṛḍhatāpādanārthaḥ ślokaḥ kṛtvetyādipūrvaka eva |
SA11n1132:65: samanvāharaṇaprayuktasya sarvadharmaparyeṣṭisahāyabhūtasya sarvakalyāṇamitradarśanasarvabuddhadharmasamudānayanaprayuktasya bodhisattvapraṇidhijñānaśarīrasya hetupratyayabhūtamavalokaya acintyakuśalamūlendriyavegān vivardhayamānaḥ || iti ||
SA11n1132:66: āryākṣayamatinirdeśe mahāyānasūtre'pyuktam- eko bodhisattvo'dvitīyo'sahāyo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃnāhuṃ saṃnahyati |
SA11n1132:68: sa evaṃ dṛḍhasaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ yatkiṃcitsarvasattvānāṃ pariprāpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyati,
SA11n1132:79: yāvadekākinā mayā advitīyena asahāyena vajramaye mahīmaṇḍale sthitena sabalaṃ savāhanaṃ māraṃ dharṣayitvā eka [ citta] kṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhavyeti ||
SA11n1132:80: āryavajradhvajasūtrepyāha- tadyathāpi nāma sūryo devaputra udayamāno na tiṣṭhati jātyandhadoṣeṇa,
SA11n1132:88: evameva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ smṛtisaṃprajanyavipulagambhīracetā adīnasattvo guṇacaryājñānacaryāvasānaṃ yāvanna vivartate sattvadrauhilyadoṣaiḥ,
SA11n1132:98: yaśca teṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ duḥkhaskandho vividhaṃ cāvaraṇīyaṃ karma samutthitam,
SA11n1132:99: yena te āvaraṇīyena karmaṇā buddhānna paśyanti,
SA11n1132:102: tadahaṃ teṣāṃ trividhamāvaraṇīyaṃ karmopacitaṃ duḥkhaskandhena svakena śarīreṇopādadāmi tāsu tāsu narakopapattiṣu apāyabhūmiṣu saṃvāseṣu ca |
SA11n1132:106: na nivarte na palāyāmi nottrasyāmi na saṃtrasyāmi na bibhemi na pratyudāvarte na biṣīdāmi |
SA11n1132:112: mayā sarvajagatsamuttārayitavyam jātikāntārājjarākāntārād vyādhikāntārāccyutyupapattikāntārāt sarvāpattikāntārātsarvāpāyakāntārātsarvasaṃsārakāntārātsarvadṛṣṭigahanakāntārātkuśaladharma-praṇāśakāntārādajñānasamutthitakāntārāt tadete mayā sarvasattvāḥ sarvakāntārebhyaḥ parimocayitavyāḥ |
SA11n1132:113: tṛṣṇājālasaktā avidyānīvaraṇāvṛtā bhavatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktāḥ praṇāśaparyavasānā duḥkhapañjaraprakṣiptāścārakasaṃniśritāḥ abudhāḥ pratijñāviruddhāḥ saṃśayabhūtāḥ sadā vimatayo'kṣemadarśinaḥ aniḥ śaraṇakuśalā bhavārṇave āvartamaṇḍalaikacaraṇāḥ |
SA11n1132:131: ahaṃ ca sarvasattvānāmarthāya sarvaduḥkhavedanāskandhamanena svakena śarīreṇānubhaveyam |
SA11n1132:132: sarvasattvanidānamahaṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ prātibhāvyamutsahe satyavādī pratyayito'visaṃvādakaḥ |
SA11n1132:135: sarvasattvārambaṇo mama sarvajñatācittotpāda utpanno yaduta sarvajagatparimocanāya |
SA11n1132:136: na cāhaṃ ratikāmatayā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ,
SA11n1132:149: ete ca sattvāḥ kāmānniṣevamāṇāḥ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśāddūrībhavanti |
SA11n1132:155: tathā tathaiva mayā kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā yathaiva sarvasattvā atyantasukhamaveditasukhaṃ yāvatsarvajñatāsukhaṃ pratilabheran |
SA11n1132:156: mayā sārathinā mayā pariṇāyakena mayolkādhāriṇā mayā kṣemagatidarśakena mayā kṣaṇagatipratilabdhena mayopāyajñena maya arthaviduṣā mayā saṃsārasāgare sarvajñajñānayānapātramahādeśasthitena mayā pariṇāmanakuśalena mayā pāradarśakena |
SA11n1132:158: na khalu punarasmiścāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau yāvantaḥ sattvāstāvanta eva sūryā udāgacchanti cāturdvīpakalokadhātvavabhāsanāya |
SA11n1132:159: atha ca punareka evaiṣāṃ sūrya udāgacchati caturdvīpāvabhāsanāya |
SA11n1132:160: na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ caturdvīpopapannānāṃ svakasvakaiḥ śarīraraivabhāsaḥ prādurbhavati,
SA11n1132:169: atha ca punaḥ sūryasya devaputrasya udayata ekasya sūryamaṇḍalasyādvitīyasya cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sarvasattvānāmavabhāsaḥ prādurbhavati |
SA11n1132:170: evameva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlānyupārjayamānasya kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayamānasya evaṃ cittamutpadyate- naiteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ vidyate yena te ātmānaṃ paritrāyeran,
SA11n1132:172: ahaṃ punaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ kuśalamūlāni samudānayāmi,
SA11n1132:189: āryākṣayamatisūtre'pyāha- sa na kalpagaṇanayā bodhiṃ paryeṣate - iyataḥ kalpān saṃnatsyāmi,
SA11n1132:194: evaṃrūpai rātriṃdivaiḥ pañcadaśadaivasikena pakṣeṇa triṃśaddaivasikena māsena dvādaśamāsikena saṃvatsareṇa anayā varṣagaṇanayā yāvadvarṣaśatasahastreṇa ekaṃ bodhicittamutpādayeyam,
SA11n1132:196: anena praveśena anayā gaṇanayā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamaiścittotpādaistathāgatadarśanaiśca ekaikasyāpi sattvasya cittacaritaṃ jānīyām |
SA11n1132:197: anenaiva praveśena anayā gaṇanayā sarvasattvānāṃ tāvadbhiścittotpādaistathāgatadarśanaiḥ svacittacaritāni prajānīyām |
SA11n1132:200: āryaratnameghe'pyuktam- na bodhisattvaḥ sattvakhaṭuṅkatāṃ sattvadurdāntatāṃ jñātvā- alamebhiḥ sattvairevaṃ khaṭuṅkairevaṃ durdāntairiti tatonidānaṃ parikhinnaḥ parāpṛṣṭhībhūtaḥ pariśuddhāyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānaṃ karoti |
SA11n1132:203: tatra prājño bodhisattva evaṃ cittamutpādayati- tasmātsatvadhātorye sattvāḥ syuḥ pratyavarā andhajaḍaeḍamūkajātīyāḥ aparinirvāṇadharmakāḥ kṛtsnāḥ sattvadhātau na cikitsitāḥ ,
SA11n1132:206: tānahaṃ sarvān bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbodhayeyam |
SA11n1132:207: evaṃ hi bodhisattvasya cintayataścittotpāde cittotpāde sarvamārabhavanāni prakampante |
SA11n1132:211: kiṃ punaranena dṛḍhīkṛteneti vimarṣanirāsāya dharmasaṃgītisūtre gaditam- āśaye samyag bhagavan buddhadharmāṇāṃ mūlam |
SA11n1132:214: āśayasaṃpannasya punarbhagavan yadi buddhā na bhavanti,
SA11n1132:218: tadyathā bhagavan yasya pādau tasya gamanam,
SA11n1132:222: tadyathā bhagavan yasya jīvitaṃ tasya lābhaḥ |
SA11n1132:224: tadyathā bhagavan satītvenāgnirjvalati asatītvena na jvalati,
SA11n1132:225: evameva bhagavan āśaye sati bodhisattvasya sarvabuddhadharmā jvalanti,
SA11n1132:230: tadyathā bhagavan yasya vṛkṣasya mūlaṃ vipannaṃ tasya puṣpaphalāni na bhūyaḥ prarohanti,
SA11n1132:231: evameva bhagavan yasyāśayo vipannastasya sarve kuśalā dharmā na bhūyaḥ saṃbhavanti |
SA11n1132:232: tasmāttarhi bhagavan bodhisattvena buddhabodhyarthikena svāśayaḥ sūdṛhītaḥ svārakṣitaḥ suśodhitaḥ svadhiṣṭhitaḥ kartavyaḥ | iti ||
SA11n1132:250: api ca adhyāśaya ucyate- saumyatā bhūteṣu |
SA11n1132:278: yathoktamāryadharmasaṃgītisūtre- atha khalvavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat- na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam |
SA11n1132:279: eko dharmo bhagavan bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ supratividdhaḥ kartavyaḥ |
SA11n1132:283: mahākaruṇayā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmāḥ karatalagatā bhavanti |
SA11n1132:284: tadyathā bhagavan yena rājñaścakravartinaścakraratnaṃ gacchati tena sarvo balakāyo gacchati,
SA11n1132:285: evameva bhagavan yena bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati ,
SA11n1132:287: tadyathā bhagavan āditye udite sattvāḥ karmakriyāsu pracurā bhavanti,
SA11n1132:290: tadyathā bhagavan sarveṣāmindriyāṇāṃ manasādhiṣṭhitānāṃ svasvaviṣaye grahaṇaprācuryaṃ bhavati,
SA11n1132:291: evameva bhagavan mahākaruṇādhiṣṭhitānāmanyeṣāṃ bodhikarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svasmin svasmin karaṇīye prācuryaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1132:292: tadyathā bhagavan jīvitendriye sati anyeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati,
SA11n1132:293: evameva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyāmanyeṣāṃ bodhikarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavatīti ||
SA11n1132:294: āryākṣayamatisūtre'pyāha- tadyathāpi nāma bhadanta śāradvatīputra puruṣasya jīvitendriyasya āśvāsāḥ praśvāsāḥ pūrvagamāḥ,
SA11n1132:295: evameva bhadanta śāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāyānasamudāgatasya mahākaruṇā pūrvaṃgamā ||
SA11n1132:297: syādyathāpi nāma śreṣṭhino vā gṛhapatervā evaputrake guṇavati majjāgataṃ prema,
SA11n1132:298: evameva mahākaruṇāpratilabdhasya bodhisattvasya sarvasattveṣu majjāgataṃ premeti ||
SA11n1132:300: svakamanekavidhaṃ pūrvānubhūtamanubhūyamānaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ bhayaṃ ca svātmani atyantamaniṣṭaṃ bhāvayitvā,
SA11n1132:303: yathoktamāryadaśabhūmakasūtre- tasyaivaṃ bhavati- āścarya yāvadajñānasaṃmūḍhā bateme bālapṛthagjanāḥ,
SA11n1132:304: yeṣāmasaṃkhyeyā ātmabhāvā niruddhā nirudhyante nirotsyante ca |
SA11n1132:319: apratiśaraṇāḥ tathā saṃvegamāpadyante bahūni duḥkhāni pratyunubhavantaḥ,
SA11n1132:321: hanta ahameṣāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhārtānāmanāthānāmatrāṇānāmaśaraṇānāmalayanānāmaparāyaṇānāmandhānāmavidyāṇḍakoṣapaṭalaparyavanaddhānāṃ tamobhibhūtānāmarthāya eko'dvitīyo bhūtvā tathārūpapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacayaṃ bibharmi,
SA11n1132:322: yathārūpeṇa puṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacayena saṃbhṛtena ime sarvasattvā atyantaviśuddhimanuprāpnuyuriti ||
SA11n1132:323: tathā atraivāha- saṃsārāṭavīkāntāramārgaprapannā bateme sattvā nirayatiryagyoniyamalokaprapātābhimukhāḥ kudṛṣṭiviṣamajālānuprāptāḥ mohagahanasaṃchannā mithyāmārgavitathaprayātā andhībhūtāḥ pariṇāyakavikalāḥ ||
SA11n1132:325: saṃsārastrotānuvāhinaḥ tṛṣṇānadīprapannāḥ mahāvegagrastā avalokanāsamarthāḥ kāmavyāpādavicikitsāvihiṃsāvitarkaprapātānucaritāḥ svakāyadṛṣṭayudakarākṣasagṛhītāḥ kāmagahanāvartānupraviṣṭāḥ nandīrāgamadhyasaṃsaktāḥ asmimānasthalocchannāḥ aparāyaṇāḥ āyatanagrāmānucchalitāḥ kuśalasaṃbhārakavirahitāḥ,
SA11n1132:327: ruddhā bateme sattvā bahuduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsabahula anunayapratighapriyāpriyavinibandhane saśokaparidevānucārite tṛṣṇānigaḍabandhane māyāśāṭhayāvidyāgahanasaṃchanne traidhātukacārake |
SA11n1132:328: te asmābhiḥ sarvatraidhātukaviveke abhayapure sarvaduḥkhopaśame anāvaraṇanirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā ityādi ||
SA11n1132:332: āryogradattaparipṛcchāyāṃ hi trī rātreḥ trirdivasasya ca śuceḥ śucivastraprāvṛtasya ca triskandhakapravartanamuktam |
SA11n1132:341: āryākṣayamatisūtre tu ātmaparapāpadeśanāpuṇyasaṃbhāre paṭhayete gāthācatuṣṭayena ca yathāgītaiśca stotraiḥ |
SA11n1132:343: āryaratnameghe yathoktam- iha bodhisattvo yānīmāni bhavanti puṣpajātāni vā phalajātāni vā amamānyaparigrahāṇi,
SA11n1132:344: tāni triṣkṛtvā rātrau triṣkṛtvā divase buddhabodhisattvebhyo niryātayati || pe ||
SA11n1132:345: sa yatheme dhūpavṛkṣā vā gandhavṛkṣā vā ratnavṛkṣā vā kalpavṛkṣā vā amamā aparigrahāstānapi triṣkṛtvā rātrau triṣkṛtvā divase buddhabodhisattvebhyo niryātayatīti ||
SA11n1132:350: anayā ca diśā sarvabhaiṣajyāni sarvarasāyanāni sarvasalilāni anavadyāni apmaṇḍalāni sarvakāñcanamaṇḍalāni |
SA11n1132:351: nivṛtteṣu vā lokadhātuṣu ye paramarasasparśasaṃpannā bhūparpaṭakāḥ,
SA11n1132:354: sarvottarakurudvīpeṣu pariśuddheṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye ramaṇīyatarāḥ paribhogāḥ ||
SA11n1132:355: yathā ca āryaratnamegha evāha- sa yānīmāni sūtrānteṣu udārodārāṇi tathāgatapūjopasthānāni śṛṇoti,
SA11n1132:371: tuṣitabhavanavāsamādiṃ kṛtvā cyavanacaṃkramaṇagarbhasthitijanmakumārakrīḍāntaḥ puravāsābhiniṣkramaṇaduṣkaracaryābodhimaṇḍopasaṃkramaṇamāradharṣaṇābhisaṃbodhya dhyeṣaṇamahādharmacakrapravartanamahāparinirvāṇopasaṃkramaṇāya pūjādharmasaṃgrahaprayogapūrvagamaṃ kṛtvā sarvatraikakālavivartanāya dharmadhātuvipulamākāśadhātuparyavasānamaparāntakoṭīniṣṭhaṃ sarvakalpasaṃkhyābuddhotpādasaṃkhyāpratiprastrabdhaṃ yāvanmahāparinirvāṇopasaṃkramaṇāya tṛtīyaṃ mahāpraṇidhānamabhinirharati |
SA11n1132:379: yaduta sarvakṣetraikakṣetra- ekakṣetra- sarvakṣetraikasamavasaraṇapariśodhanam apramāṇabuddhakṣetraprabhāvyūhālaṃkārapratimaṇḍitaṃ sarvakleśāpanayanapariśuddhipathopetaṃ apramāṇajñānākarasattvaparipūrṇamudārabuddhaviṣayasamavaraṇaṃ yathāśayasarvasattvasaṃdarśanasaṃtoṣaṇāya |
SA11n1132:381: yaduta sarvabodhisattvaikāśayaprayogatāyai niḥsapatnakuśalamūlopacayāya ekārambaṇasarvabodhisattvasamatāyai avirahitasatatasamitabuddhabodhisattvasamavadhānāya yatheṣṭabuddhotpādasaṃdarśanāya svacittotpādatathāgataprabhāvajñānānugamāya acyutānugāminyabhijñālambhāya sarvalokadhātvanuvicaraṇāya sarvaparṣanmaṇḍalapratibhāsaprāptaye sarvopapattisvaśarīrānugamāya acintyamahāyānopetatāyai bodhisattvacaryācaraṇāvyavacchedāya dharmadhātuvipulamākāśadhātuparyavasānamaparāntakoṭīniṣṭhaṃ sarvakalpasaṃkhyācaryāsaṃkhyāpratiprastrabdhaṃ mahāyānāvatāraṇāya aṣṭamaṃ mahāpraṇidhānamabhinirharati |
SA11n1132:382: yadutāvivartyacakrasamārūḍhabodhisattvacaryācaraṇāya amoghakāyavāṅyanaskarmaṇe sahadarśananiyatasarvabuddhadharmapratilambhāya sahaghoṣodāhārajñānānugamāya sahaprasādakleśavivartanāya mahābhaiṣajyarājopamāśrayapratilambhāya cintāmaṇivatkāyapratilambhāya sarvabodhisattvacaryācaraṇāya dharmadhātuvipulamākāśadhātuparyavasānamaparāntakoṭīniṣṭhaṃ sarvakalpasaṃkhyācaryāsaṃkhyāpratiprastrabdham amoghaghoṣatāyai navamaṃ mahāpraṇidhānamabhinirharati |
SA11n1132:390: sarvasattvānāṃ visabhāgasamavadhānabhayātyantavigamāya sarvasattvapriyaviprayogabhayanirodhāya sarvasattvāpriyasaṃvāsabhayāpanayanāya sarvasattvakāyaparipīḍābhayavisaṃyogāya sarvasattvacittaparipīḍanabhayanirmokṣaṇāya sarvasattvaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsasamatikramaṇāya pariṇāmayāmīti ||
SA11n1132:392: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva |
SA11n1132:393: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam ||
SA11n1132:395: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarva nāmayamī varabhadracarīye || iti ||
SA11n1132:396: || iti śikṣāsamuccaye bhadracaryāvidhiḥ ṣoḍaśamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ ||
